data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

i have tested it and do experience the same issue when changing from  ID to No ID. 

i have manually changed all the values in the background so long so that the data is correct. You can perform the search and view.

Please log that as an issue and find out by Gordon if it always has that issue or only occurred of late. if it only started to happen recently then it was an issue with the latest release that took place.
